about_the_game:
About the demo version

Hello! We're the development team of [Five Hearts Under One Roof].

We've released a Free Demo version for you try out!

*Please not that some features and contents are locked in the demo version. These will only be available in the full version of the game.

  • In the Free Demo, you will be able to play Chapter 1 of the game, which consists of 6 main chapters and 5 endings.

  • Disable voting in the ranking system, which allows for rank battles with other users.

  • Chapter progress rewards for Chapter 1 are not available.

We hope you'll continue to enjoy the full version as well! We'd really appreciate your support and spread the news to the world!

Plot/Characters

[Five Hearts Under One Roof] is a fully immersive interactive video game that simulates a love story with five unique heroines. As the player, you take on the role of Yuman, who has always been home alone. Now, you’ll be running a lively, love-filled boarding house with five fascinating heroines.

Who will be by your side in the end?

The First Resident: Your Childhood Friend of 20 Years - Mal-sook Go

“Are you really just going to be friends with me?”

The Second Resident: Your First Love and Former Idol - Min-jung Park

“I don’t want to be just a singer and fan with you.”

The Third Resident: Your Demanding Boss - Gran Dong

“Cute, Yuman, you like things like this?”

The Fourth Resident: The Bold and Forward Younger Girl - Eun-bi Go

“I’ve come to marry you!”

The ??th Resident: The Adorable Recluse - Seung-yi Jo

“I’ve been saved.”

Which of these five unique and captivating heroines will steal your heart?

Or… could it be that your true love lies with someone unexpected?

short_description: Yuman’s, the player, once solitary home and routine are now invaded by five beautiful women! Each has her unique charm – the 'childhood friend of 20 years,' the 'first love and former idol,' the 'demanding boss,' the 'bold younger girl,' and the 'shy recluse.' Who will you choose?
